agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Urban Affairs TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Thursday, March 14, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Angie Button The Committee will meet to hear the following: HB 647 Thompson, Senfronia Relating to the disciplinary actions that may be taken against police officers in certain municipalities. HB 852 Holland | et al. Relating to information a municipality may consider in determining the amount of certain building permit and inspection fees. HB 1135 Price Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district in certain municipalities. HB 1136 Price Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district established by a municipality. HB 1417 Clardy Relating to a common characteristic or use project in a public improvement district in certain municipalities. HB 1895 Nevárez Relating to the investigation of fire fighters employed by certain municipalities and districts. HB 2198 Clardy Relating to the use of a perpetual trust fund for a cemetery by certain municipalities. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
